PHRASE.LANG: Stargazing has never been more exciting. Enjoy the bright lights through the safety of PlayStation Home's own custom helmet display. [#Legal]
Regarder les étoiles est bien plus fascinant grâce au casque personnalisé PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
Es war nie aufregender, die Sterne zu betrachten. Genießen Sie die hellen Lichter durch das sichere Helmvisier von PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
Guardare le stelle non è mai stato così emozionante. Goditi le luci scintillanti in tutta sicurezza attraverso il display del casco personalizzato di PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
Mirar las estrellas es ahora más emocionante que nunca. Disfruta de su brillo a través de la seguridad del visor del casco de diseño exclusivo de PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]
Stargazing has never been more exciting. Enjoy the bright lights through the safety of Home's own custom helmet display. [#Legal]
